title: HEALING Infused with Unakite Crystal Aromatherapy Potion
description: Refresh, renew and restore balance with the healing power of aromatherapy and crystal healing.
cleaned_text: HEALING Infused with Unakite Crystal Aromatherapy Potion "The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. The challenge is to silence the mind." - Caroline Myss You can learn to awaken and heal your Soul to access the inner powers you've lost or forgotten. The power of the Soul is passion, creativity, intuition and connection with the Divine. Regardless of which spiritual path or religion you follow you can access the power of your Soul to create a life worth living. It all begins with releasing and letting go of the things holding us back. Pine - Acceptance Egyptian Musk - Strength Patchouli - Stimulating Amber - Balance
